content: use up that scrap yarn and make the ursula coaster today supplies needed 30 - 40 yards worsted weight cotton i/5 50mm crochet hook measuring tape scissors yarn needle stitches & abbreviations chain chain cluster cluster double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet skip skip yo yarn over notes written in us crochet terms a stitch count is provided at the end of each row clusters are worked into the top of cluster of previous row pattern contains stitch instructions for the cluster stitch gauge 8 cluster x 8 row = 4 of stich pattern finished size 4 x 4 i d love to hear from you don t hesitate to contact me let me know what you re working on or designs you d like to see in the future use the links above or email me at crochetsbytrista@gmail com if you ve purchased my designs in the past leave a review i want to know what you think you may sell finished items made with my pattern i just ask that you credit the design to crochets by trista i can not offer any refunds on patterns due to it being a pdf download
